content:
<rule id="3rd-party-30500" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="dysmsapi20170525" groupId="com.aliyun"/>
                    </project>                    
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="spring-cloud-alicloud-sms" groupId="com.alibaba.cloud"/>
                    </project>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="aliyun-sms-spring-boot-starter" groupId="com.alibaba.cloud"/>
                    </project>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="spring-cloud-starter-alicloud-sms" groupId="com.alibaba.cloud"/>
                    </project>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded framework - Cloud SMS">
                    <description>The application embeds the Sentinel framework.</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Cloud SMS</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
